Name: Assigning a CSM to a Customer

Languages.Title: Assigning a CSM to a Customer
Languages.Content:
The Assign CSM feature lets you assign a CSM to customers who don't already have one. **CSM users** or users  having **Admin level access**  can Assign CSM

### How to assign a CSM to a customer?

#### Method-1 
1. Login to your Churn360 account
2. If there are customers with no CSM, it will be displayed under **Customers without CSM** tile.
![1_Screenshot_Assign_CSM_customer](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/1_Screenshot_Assign_CSM_customer.png){height="" width=""}

2. Click on the **Customers without CSM** tile to see all the customers without CSM in a seperate page. (The list of customers will be shown in a list inside customers page.)
 
![2_Screenshot_Assign_CSM_CUSTOMERS](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/2_Screenshot_Assign_CSM_CUSTOMERS.png){height="" width=""}

3. You can choose a CSM from the list and assign it to the customer by simply clicking the **Assign CSM** link next to the customer's name.

![3_Screenshot_Assign_CSM](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/3_Screenshot_Assign_CSM.png){height="" width=""}

#### Method -2

1. Click on **Customers tab** adjacent to **Dashboard tab** 
2. Click on the intended customer who has no CSM assigned from the list of customers 
3. On the **Overview page**, you can assign CSM to the customer under **Info widget** as shown below 
![5_Screenshot_Assign_CSM](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/5_Screenshot_Assign_CSM.png){height="" width=""}

:::(Info) (How to reassaign a new CSM to the customer?)
You can follow one of the above two methods to reassign a new CSM. Remember, you'll need to be CSM or a should have Admin level access to reassaign a CSM.
:::
